text: Petr Hannig (20 January 1946 – 21 January 2025) was a Czech singer, producer, activist and politician. He was the leader of the Party of Common Sense. He was an unsuccessful candidate for president in the 2018 Czech presidential election. He came in seventh place. He was born in Ústí nad Labem, Czechoslovakia. Hannig died in Prague, Czech Republic on 21 January 2025, one day after his 79th birthday. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Czech politicians Category:Czech singers Category:Political activists
title: Petr Hannig
